Comment:
please note that i will use these abbreviations : o-o or o-o-o = castling, !! = very good move, ! = good move, ?? = very bad move, ? = bad move, !? = may be good, may be bad.
1. d4 to be in the center.
i used to start with e4, but i found that d4 is better.
trying to get black out of the center, and preparing for e4 to control the center and open the way for the other B.
developing and to be in stronger position.
the same plus preparing  for o-o. !
defending move. ? much better attacking move NC3. !
attacking B and trying to get red of pinning. !
